name: Diablo II
notes:
- Install into C:\Program File (x86)\Diablo II
- P2P network used by downloader seems to not work (files are downloaded directly from Blizzard servers)
- starts in window
content:
files:
- installer:
    filename: Downloader_Diablo2_enUS.exe
    url: https://www.battle.net/download/getLegacy?product=D2DV&locale=en-US&os=WIN
game:
  args: -w
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Diablo II/Diablo II.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
